params.label: organization-defined connection ports or input/output devices

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: {{ sc-41_prm_1 }} disable or remove {{ sc-41_prm_2 }} on the following systems or system components: {{ sc-41_prm_3 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Connection ports include Universal Serial Bus (USB), Thunderbolt, and Firewire (IEEE 1394). Input/output (I/O) devices include compact disc and digital versatile disc drives. Disabling or removing such connection ports and I/O devices helps prevent the exfiltration of information from systems and the introduction of malicious code from those ports or devices. Physically disabling or removing ports and/or devices is the stronger action.
